content: move over beanies this packable sun hat is about to be the most functional stylish crochet project your head has ever seen whether you re globe trotting or walking your dog you ll feel like a goddess of diy wearing your completely handmade fedora lion brand rewind yarn ensures the cleo fedora is moldable comfy and surprisingly lightweight skills required include single_crochet and working in the round this ad-free pdf includes written instructions a photo tutorial and a link to a step-by-step video tutorial as well as a video tutorial for adding an optional inexpensive wire to stabilize the brim the photos are separate from the written pattern so you can choose to print them or conserve ink the combination of style and function might just make this your go-to crochet project for the warmer months if you like the cleo fedora you ll also love the tate rancher hat this pattern originally appeared on make & do crew skill level - advanced beginner sizing small - fits 21-22 heads large - fits 22 5-23 5 heads downloading - this listing is for the cleo fedora crochet pattern pdf only pattern pdf will be available for instant download upon payment copyright/making finished items - thank you for sharing my patterns and tutorials when you do it helps support the blog and my ability to create more patterns which by the way i seriously love to do so really i mean it thank you you may make items to sell with this pattern/tutorial in exchange i ask that you link back to makeanddocrew com do not use my photos as your own sales photos do not distribute my patterns/templates as your own permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing of any kind return policy - as this is a digital product i do not offer returns check out more of our free crochet patterns for summer here 1 1 https //makeanddocrew com/category/holiday-projects/summer/
